title: Infineon Technologies Security Controller IFX_CCI_001Fh, IFX_CCI_002Fh, IFX_CCI_0030h, IFX_CCI_0033h, IFX_CCI_0035h, IFX_CCI_0036h, IFX_CCI_0038h design step S11 and M11 with optional HSL v2.62.7626, optional SCL version v2.04.003, UMSLC lib v01.00.0234 with specific ICdedicated firmware identifier 80.304.01.0 and user guidance
